affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We keep experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Zain network in Sudan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Sender ID Registration Requests Failing for a Set of Customers

incident_updates.body: The issue with Sender ID Registration requests failing for a set of customers  has been resolved, and the service is functioning normally at this time.

We are experiencing an issue with Sender ID Registration requests failing for a set of customers. Our engineers are working to resolve this issue. As a temporary workaround, customers can submit their applications here: https://twlo.my.salesforce-sites.com/SenderId 
We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing an issue with Sender ID Registration requests failing for a set of customers. Our engineers are working to resolve this issue. As a temporary workaround, customers can submit their applications here: https://twlo.my.salesforce-sites.com/SenderId 
We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We’ve become aware of a potential issue with Sender ID Registration requests failing for some customers. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
